title: Cinema Jazireh
overview: Afghanistan under the brutal rule of the Taliban. After surviving her familyâ€™s massacre, Leila has just one goal in life: to find her son Omid. But in a country where being a woman means being less than nothing, her chances are desperately slim, and so she chooses an extreme and dangerous solution. She radically changes her identity and sets out on a path where even the slightest hesitation can mean death.
